examples.example: 当我抬头望向天空，看见那绚丽的彩虹横跨天际，心中满是欢喜。

translate.english: When I look up at the sky and see the gorgeous rainbow spanning across the sky, my heart is full of joy.

examples.example: 每次我看见那些努力奋斗的人，就备受鼓舞，充满了前进的动力。

translate.english: Every time I see those who strive hard, I am greatly inspired and filled with the motivation to move forward.

examples.example: 我看见阳光透过树叶的缝隙洒下来，那画面真美。

translate.english: I saw the sunlight streaming down through the gaps between the leaves, and that scene was really beautiful.
